data.title: U.S. District Court, Western District of Texas
data.meta_description:
U.S. District Court, Western District of Texas | 789 followers on LinkedIn. The United States Courts are an independent, national judiciary providing fair and impartial justice within the jurisdiction conferred by the Constitution and Congress.  As an equal branch of government, the federal judiciary preserves and enhances its core values as the courts meet changing national and local needs.

The United States District Court for the Western District of Texas (in case citations, W.D.
data.text:
Recent maintenance on the court's public proceeding calendars requires action on your behalf if you are visiting the site. Ensure you have the latest copy of the page by performing a "hard refresh" in your browser. See our post about this for more details. #federalcourt #attorneys #federalbar https://lnkd.in/gKmrZ25r

ATTENTION PRACTICING ATTORNEYS IN WDTX The Western District of Texas ECF system will be be unavailable due to extended maintenance. This outage will begin at 8 AM CST on Saturday May 18, 2024 and extend through 8 AM CST on Monday May 20, 2024. #federalbar #barassociation #federalcourts https://lnkd.in/gzV-xciY

By Order of the Court, the El Paso Division will be closed on Friday, July 5, 2024. This order affects the U.S. District Courts, U.S. Magistrate Courts, U.S. District Clerk’s Office, U.S. Probation Office, and U.S. Pretrial Services Office. For more information, review the order below. #elpaso #july4 #courtclosure https://lnkd.in/gVua6dfv

You may have seen the recent “Coming Soon” banner while signing in to eVoucher, announcing the implementation of Login.gov. This is a Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) login method for CJA Panel Attorneys and Experts coming May 11th. MFA is a layered approach to securing data and applications where a system requires a user to present a combination of two or more credentials to verify a user’s identity for eVoucher sign in. Be on the lookout for more information as it becomes available. #cja #evoucher #logingov #mfa https://lnkd.in/gY-Cy6iJ

This project is in its final stages. We anticipate court to return to this district courtroom after the Presidents’ Day holiday weekend. The public site has updated information on connection information and attorney requirements for this location.

Austin U.S. Courthouse Closure Wednesday, February 14, 2024 By Order of the Court, the Austin U.S. Courthouse will be closed on Wednesday, February 14, 2024. This order affects the U.S. District and Magistrate Courts, the U.S. District Clerk’s Office, the U.S. Probation Office, and the U.S. Pretrial Services Office. Please click the title of this News item to view the Austin General Order. https://lnkd.in/d8CVbQ8t

Midland attorneys, make note of the maintenance window for the District courtroom at this location. Review court calendars to ensure you know where proceedings are scheduled during this time. #federalcourt #innovation #audiovisual https://lnkd.in/g4zCpgvx

Proposed Chapter 14 of the Pattern Jury Instructions (Civil Cases) — Trademark and Service Mark Claims The committee on Civil Pattern Jury Instructions of the Fifth Circuit District Judge Association is requesting comments on proposed Chapter 14 of the Pattern Jury Instructions (Civil Cases): a new chapter that covers Trademark and Service Mark Claims. https://lnkd.in/d8CVbQ8t

Our court is hiring! Visit our careers page for information on any of these openings: * Term Law Clerk to U.S. Magistrate Judge Derek Gilliland – Waco, TX. * Term Law Clerk to U.S. Magistrate Judge Designee Joseph Cordova – Del Rio, TX * Human Resource Specialist * Official Court Interpreter (multiple) * RPA Developer (Automation Anywhere) - Remote #federaljobs #federalcourt #nowhiring https://lnkd.in/gcFqssk

Orders have been entered regarding office closures during the upcoming holiday season. These orders affect the U.S. District Court, U.S. Magistrate Court, U.S. District Clerk’s Office, Executive Offices of the Clerk, U.S. Probation Office, U.S. Pretrial Services Office and the Federal Public Defender. To get more information about the closures, you can find the orders under the Court Info menu and then click on Court Holidays on our website. #holidayschedule #federalcourt https://lnkd.in/gPYDw-JU
